## clonr docs

Print the version number of Clonr

### Synopsis

All software has versions. This is Clonr's

```
clonr docs [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help         help for docs
  -o, --out string   The filepath of the directory you would like to output the files (default "./clonr-docs")
```
